item.title: Project: visited destinations on a map
item.description: I love to travel, and have tried to visit at least a couple of destinations each year. Yesterday for fun I prototyped an interactive map that shows the destinations I’ve been to: It helps to have a tool with which you can pan+zoom and visually see the places you have yet to visit.
